title: 【具体mod具体对待】怎么装这个？
author: geludan
txt_content:
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/105117-16-06-builders-06-05-mob/
builder，首先说明我版本装对了，是最新的
然后下好了以后有add to bin, add to jar, add to resource, srccode
前三个没问题，并且jar里边M什么的也删了
但是srccode？貌似是source code的简写，干嘛的？放哪里？
然后
Blueprint Guide.txt
BuildingList.txt
Changelist.txt
Instructions.txt
放哪里？简而言之
add to bin
add to jar
add to resource
srccode
Blueprint Guide.txt
BuildingList.txt
Changelist.txt
Instructions.txt
前三个解决，后五个no idea，进入游戏无npc
要改npc出生rate，数量在哪里改？以前1.3用过，现在不一样了
状态：原版，没有mod，没有皮肤，版本1.66

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
Builders 0.6_05 (Includes the Source Code; This source code is only there to be looked at if you are interested in seeing how the mod was coded.)

源代碼... 給你編碼參考用的文件... 不需要放進遊戲中

其他四個是說明文件... 同樣隨你放哪都成, 不放也可以

請注意看 Instructions.txt

Also in the Builders folder, there is a file called BuilderConfiguration.txt.  Modifying the numbers in this text file will change various attributes relating to the Builder Mobs.  See Configuration Details below for more information.



說實在的, 人家帖子及說明文件都寫得清清楚楚了, 怎麼就不先看一看咧...

replies.author: aizuo
replies.txt_content:
well 发表于 2011-6-11 06:02 
Builders 0.6_05 (Includes the Source Code; This source code is only there to be looked at if you are ...
话说上次我不小心把给自己看的一张配方图片丢进jar，也黑屏了，原来jar会读取所有东西啊……
我还以为有个索引表，无关的东西就不会读取呢……
